TypeSignature.Value: public interface IRowSetMetaData : IDisposable, Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, Java.Sql.IResultSetMetaData

.class public interface auto ansi abstract IRowSetMetaData implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, class Java.Sql.IResultSetMetaData, class Java.Sql.IWrapper, class System.IDisposable
type IRowSetMetaData = interface interface IResultSetMetaData interface IWrapper interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable

Docs.summary: An object that contains information about the columns in a RowSet object.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetAutoIncrement(int32 columnIndex, bool property) cil managed
abstract member SetAutoIncrement : int * bool -> unit

Docs.param: the first column is 1, the second is 2, ...
true if the column is automatically numbered; false if it is not
Docs.summary: Sets whether the designated column is automatically numbered, The default is for a RowSet object's columns not to be automatically numbered.
